kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using `dbName`, `dbUsername`, and `dbPassword`.
kw.msg: Connecting using : pymysql.connect(db=robot, user=root, passwd=, host=localhost, port=3306, charset=None)

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.doc: Executes the sqlString as SQL commands. Useful to pass arguments to your sql. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.
kw.msg: Executing : Execute SQL String | INSERT INTO apidetails VALUES('TestAPIDefend','POST','https','defendtheweb.net','/playground/sqli2?q=$A$','{"":""}','{"Content-Type": "application/json","Connection": "keep-alive","Cookie": "PHPSESSID=84uven6il9vls9pl92anohvki0; cookies_dismissed=1"}','{"":""}','D:/Programming/Application Security/coe-application-security/DataFiles/Payloads.xlsx','SQL');

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Query
kw.doc: Uses the input `selectStatement` to query for the values that will be returned as a list of tuples. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback. Set optional input `returnAsDict` to True to return values as a list of dictionaries.
kw.msg: Executing : Query | SELECT * FROM apidetails WHERE API_Name='TestAPIDefend';
